## DataResponse interface

Standard data response

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataResponse<TData> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./grid.dataresponse.data.md) | <code>TData[]</code> | Currently returned data that are being displayed |
|  [totalCount](./grid.dataresponse.totalcount.md) | <code>number</code> | Count of all elements for current filter (without paging) |
